hero.headline: Navigate CCSIT with Confidence.
hero.subheadline: Real-time indoor navigation, faculty availability, and emergency routing—all in one smart app.

features.title: Why Dolani?
features.precisionDesc: Turn-by-turn directions to any room with 1-meter accuracy using BLE Beacons.
features.facultyDesc: Real-time status indicators. Know if your professor is Available, Busy, or Away.
features.searchDesc: Find labs, offices, and lecture halls instantly by name or code (e.g., 'A11-201').
features.emergencyDesc: Safety first. One-tap routing to the nearest safe exit, automatically avoiding elevators.

how.title: How It Works
how.step1Desc: Our app detects signals from BLE beacons installed every 8 meters.
how.step2Desc: We calculate your exact position using trilateration and advanced signal smoothing.
how.step3Desc: The A* algorithm finds the shortest path to your destination instantly.

tech.tagline: Built for reliability. Works even when campus Wi-Fi is unstable.

team.title: Meet the Team
team.subtitle: The minds behind Dolani - Group 06 CCSIT

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: Do I need internet to use Dolani?
faq.a1: Yes, an internet connection is required to fetch real-time faculty status, but navigation data is cached for offline use.
faq.a2: Dolani works on any iOS or Android device with Bluetooth 4.0 (BLE) support.
faq.a3: Absolutely. Your location is calculated locally on your device and is never stored or sent to our servers.
faq.q4: How strict is the faculty availability?
faq.a4: Faculty members manage their status manually, but we also use office beacons to auto-update when they are in their office.
